name: PIANO CLASSES
description: Most violins have a hollow wooden body. It is the smallest and thus highest-pitched instrument (soprano) in the family in regular.

name: WIND INSTRUMENTS
description: The is a fretted musical instrument that typically has six strings. It is held flat against the player's body and played by strumming.

name: GUITAR LESSENS
description: On several marketing blogs, though, “tone of voice” is confused with written tone, especially when used to describe writing for.

name: DRUM EXPERTS
description: As with all single-reed instruments, sound is produced when a reed vibrates to produce a sound wave inside the instrument's body.
